com.ephesoft.dcma.docassembler

Class DocumentAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.docassembler.DocumentAssembler

  • @Component
public class DocumentAssembler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class retrieves a proper classification (Barcode, Image and Search classification) based on factory classification specified in resources.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    DocumentAssemblerServiceImpl, DocumentClassification

      • createDocument

        public final void createDocument(java.lang.String batchInstanceID)
                          throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method will create new documents for all the pages of the document type Unknown.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceID - String
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - Check for input parameters, read all pages of document and create document for every page.

      • getDocumentTypes

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDocumentTypes(PluginPropertiesService pluginPropertiesService,
                                                java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier)
        Fetches the list of all the document types defined for a particular batch.
        Parameters:
        pluginPropertiesService - PluginPropertiesService The instance of pluginPropertiesService needed for fetching the list of all the document types for a particular batch.
        batchInstanceIdentifier - String The batch Instance identifier.
        Returns:
        List <{@link String}> The list of document types.

      • removeFirstPageOfDocument

        public static void removeFirstPageOfDocument(Document document)
        Removes the first page of the document if the document contains more than one page.If document contains only single page then it will nor remove that page.
        Parameters:
        document - Document The instance of Document.

      • getDescriptionForDocument

        public static DocumentType getDescriptionForDocument(PluginPropertiesService pluginPropertiesService,
                                     java.lang.String docTypeName,
                                     java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier,
                                     boolean isFromWebService,
                                     DocumentTypeService docTypeService)
        This api returns the document type if present of provided document name.
        Parameters:
        pluginPropertiesService - PluginPropertiesService the service of plugin properties.
        docTypeName - String the name of document type name.
        batchInstanceIdentifier - String the batch instance identifier.
        Returns:
        DocumentType the document of provided name.
